headline: KeyBanc Reaffirms Crown Castle (CCI) Buy Rating Following Strong Q3 Performance
summary: Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) ranks among the stocks in Bill Gates’ portfolio that analysts are watching. Following the third-quarter 2025 results for Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI), KeyBanc reaffirmed its Overweight rating and $120 price target on the company’s shares on October 23. Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE:CCI) delivered better-than-expected results across all key measures in the […]
